name: @rakered/forms
description: Tiny helper to help with form submissions.
author: Stephan Meijer <stephan@meijer.ws>

scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch -m 'release(forms): cut the %s release'
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor -m 'release(forms): cut the %s release'
scripts.bump:major: npm version major -m 'release(forms): cut the %s release'
